cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an unknown enum 'invalid_level' will cause configuration parsing failure and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the downlink subcarrier spacing to an invalid value '5' (valid values are 0,1,2,3) will cause cell configuration failure and prevent proper radio resource allocation.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行鏈路子載波間距設定為無效值 '5'（有效值為 0、1、2、3），會導致小區配置失敗，並阻止正確的無線資源分配。
